about_the_game:
The Night Watch is a retro-styled survival horror set in an abandoned shopping mall. Upon investigating reports of overnight vandalism from the property owner, you find the back office computers have been running idle for years gone by. A rampant computer virus has other plans for the thought-to-be abandoned structure and anyone who dares enter it.



  • Restore each corrupted PC, Unlock new areas, and take back control.
  • Leverage items found around the map to ensure your escape and survival.
  • Retro 3D graphics style inspired by games of the '90s and early 2000s.
  • The Night Watch is a "shorter-form" horror game that can be completed in one sitting.



  • Assemble a night watch team of up to 4 players.
  • Revive incapacitated players to improve your team's chances of survival.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes cartoon/fantasy violence and other common horror-related themes.

short_description: The Night Watch is a retro-styled survival horror set in an abandoned shopping mall. Investigate overnight vandalism reports as a night watch security guard. Restore every corrupted computer, and unlock new areas. Take on the night watch in online co-op mode, or venture in on your own.
